channel.title: Need Help making a Highscore page =(
channel.description:
People want a highscore page for my server... For pking. Can someone help with these codes? Im not THAT good at coding.
Please reply!

item.title: Need Help making a Highscore page =(
item.dc:creator: @slimjimm000 slimjimm000
item.description:
@slimjimm000 wrote:

can someone get me a application that runs thru the chacter files in the source and adds the highest skill levels and exp in a text document

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help making a Highscore page =(

item.title: Need Help making a Highscore page =(
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

[quote=“varek, post:4, topic:167113”]Or maybe both.
Conventionally, player info is stored in a database, and an interface is made in PHP.[/quote]
Good job! Someone got something right for once…

[quote=“Pw4ag3, post:1, topic:167113”]People want a highscore page for my server… For pking. Can someone help with these codes? Im not THAT good at coding.

Please reply![/quote]

My server in development uses MySQL for any stored data, no text files what-so-ever. I actually know some good PHP and I’ve set up a highscore page for my server, even though it isn’t completed.
http://www.agfonline.net/allgofree/new/highscores.php

It may take a few seconds to load, because it has to exclude Administrators from the list.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help making a Highscore page =(
